Burning Hammer was coming closer to the Neutral base. His intentions were t=
o kill, and if anyone got in his way, he would have to kill them as well. I=
t was ever since that one faithful day. He shouldn't have let them go befor=
e, he should have known they'd run. But now he was going to get his quary, =
and one of the fools was leading him to them, it was perfect. Burning Hamme=
r was talking to Lambda as he traveled, but he would not look behind himsel=
f to check if she was there. Burning Hammer was willing to swim across wate=
r, climb across treacherous rocks, and cross canyons to get to his destinat=
ion. Three of the poor souls were about to die, three, but he might find th=
ey are with some others, and he would kill them too. He killed the rest of =
their family, and there was nothing at all that could possibly stand in his=
 way of adding to his collection, nobody was up to this challenge, nobody. =
Because it was his challenge, and he was Burning Hammer, the best assassin =
in the universe. Nobody has ever escaped alive...unless he allowed it...
